Topic: Time-to-Model Measurement (KPI measuring elapsed time from project initiation/threat ID to validated threat model completion, inferred from NIST SP 800-55 process efficiency metrics; not a standard term but analogous to security measurement programs). Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Threat Modeling > Organizational Implementation > Metrics and KPIs > Time-to-Model Measurement. Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] - Scaffolding: [INSERT FULL 4 LAYERS FROM ABOVE] Generate 25 high-quality flashcards following this exact schema: {FOR EACH FLASHCARD: Front: [Question] --- Back: Correct Answer: [Answer] Explanation: [Detailed, with Bloom level, layer, active learning link, sources] Distractors: [List 3 with why wrong] } Ensure: University-level rigor (Bloom's progression), web-grounded (NIST SP 800-55 full links), distractors per protocol, full coverage of objectives/layers/hierarchy. Output only in the specified format, no extras.
